tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username STRING,
  email STRING,
  age INT,
  ar_experience STRING
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    profile_pic BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE experiences (
    experience_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    experience_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    date_created TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ar_data (
    ar_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_id UUID REFERENCES experiences(experience_id),
    ar_model BYTEA,
    ar_texture BYTEA,
    ar_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    location_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    latitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
    longitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ar_experiences (
    experience_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    experience_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    ar_model_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    profile_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    first_name VARCHAR(255),
    last_name VARCHAR(255),
    bio TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_location (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    country VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(255),
    street_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    theme VARCHAR(255),
    language VARCHAR(255),
    frequency VARCHAR(50)
);
